title: Worlds Viewing Party - HOYTS?
body:
Hey,

Haven't seen anything on a Worlds viewing party for this year - are they happening?
If anyone knows I would appreciate any info!!

Thanks :)

replies.body:
Sorry for leaving it so late guys - lots of external factors.

Will be announcing as soon as we can! Stay tuned :D

I imagine it will be released soon. I'm super keen for the Auckland one.

Cheers

this!! I hope there will be enough time T^T can't wait for auckland 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

I know its not on a big screen, but Pixel bar & cafe in Huntingdale will be having worlds up on a projector. For those who don't want to go all the way into the city anyway. They have a facebook page but wont link due to board rules {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
They would probs announce it closer to the finals date TBH. Keep an eye out :D
